creator: cate@debian.org
text:
From a clean source, apache build the function, but it is already included in
glibc. apache is build with a minimal configuration and statically. If need I'll
send all the configure parameters. 

/bin/sh /root/sources/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=link 
gcc-3.4 -pthread  -O2 -mtune=athlon -march=athlon -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLINUX=2
-D_REENTRANT -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500 -D_BSD_SOURCE -D_SVID_SOURCE -D_GNU_SOURCE  
-I/root/sources/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr-util/include
-I/root/sources/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr-util/include/private 
-I/root/sources/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr/include  -I/usr/local/include -I. 
-version-info 9:7:9    -o gen_uri_delims  gen_uri_delims.lo -lrt -lm -lcrypt
-lnsl  -lpthread -ldl
libtool: link: warning: `-version-info' is ignored for programs
/usr/lib/libc_nonshared.a(elf-init.oS)(.gnu.linkonce.t.__i686.get_pc_thunk.bx+0x0):
In function `__i686.get_pc_thunk.bx':
: multiple definition of `__i686.get_pc_thunk.bx'
.libs/gen_uri_delims.o(.gnu.linkonce.t.__i686.get_pc_thunk.bx+0x0): first
defined here
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
make[4]: *** [gen_uri_delims] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/root/sources/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr-util/uri'
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
That looks like a broken GCC/libc installation; try a Debian users list if this
is a Debian installation.
